dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM-DD-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') time_stamp FROM DUAL

SELECT sprov.servprov_xid carrier, sh.shipment_xid shipment_id, REPLACE(TRIM((CASE WHEN ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_NOT STARTED' AND sh.start_time BETWEEN (SYSDATE -365) AND (SYSDATE -0.75) THEN 'Pickup Late' END) || ' ' || (CASE WHEN sh.end_time BETWEEN (SYSDATE -365) AND (SYSDATE -0.75) THEN 'Delivery Late' END)),' ',', ') ship_status, sref1.shipment_refnum_value loc, sref2.shipment_refnum_value item_name, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(sh.start_time,sh.source_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YYYY') pickup_date, loc1.location_name origin_name, loc1.city origin_city, loc1.province_code origin_state, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(sh.end_time,sh.dest_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YYYY') delivery_date, loc2.location_name delivery_name, loc2.province_code delivery_state, tm.transport_mode_xid trans_mode, REPLACE(sv.status_value_xid,'ENROUTE_','') enroute_status, REPLACE(sh.insert_user,'SCOULAR/FOOD.','') planner FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_status ss ON sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE' INNER JOIN shipment_type st ON sh.shipment_type_gid = st.shipment_type_gid AND st.shipment_type_xid = 'TRANSPORT' AND NOT st.shipment_type_xid = 'NON FREIGHT RELATED CHARGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN servprov sprov ON sh.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN transport_mode tm ON sh.transport_mode_gid = tm.transport_mode_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN status_value sv ON ss.status_value_gid = sv.status_value_gid WHERE sh.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.FOBCARR','SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER') AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ((sh.start_time BETWEEN (SYSDATE -365) AND (SYSDATE -0.75) AND ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_NOT STARTED') OR (sh.end_time BETWEEN (SYSDATE -365) AND (SYSDATE -0.75) AND ss.status_value_gid IN ('SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_DELAYED', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_DIVERTED', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_ENROUTE', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_MERGED', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_NOT STARTED', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_PARTIAL', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_UNLOADED - FULL', 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_UNLOADED - PARTIAL'))) AND sh.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND sh.perspective = 'B' AND sh.servprov_gid NOT IN (SELECT SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=')+11,25),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=')+11,25),'&')-1) servprov_gid FROM process_control_request WHERE TOPIC_CLASS_NAME='glog.server.workflow.adhoc.ScheduleReportTopic' AND INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID') > 0) ORDER BY sh.start_time
